text.language: Je vai pe pas/ri pamenrit: e~ta ta'u,/ ]ma] n~q/tf: aferpaouws cwtem n~cwf: je n~yof pe pireftanqo.
“This is My beloved Son in whom I am pleased. He has performed My will; obey Him, for He is the Giver of Life.”

language.div: "Inilah Anak-Ku yang Kukasihi, kepada-Nya Aku berkenan/ Dia melakukan kehendak-Ku/ dengarkanlah Dia, sebab Dia Pemberi Hidup".

text.language: هذا هو إبنى حبيبى الذى سُرت به نفسى وصنع مشيئتى له إسمعوا لأنه هو المحيى.
